segments.text: Whoa, look at that sink gushing water over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's just running, no one stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, completely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddleâ€”how hasn't she felt that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, a boy's on a stool reaching the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling; didn't see that coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, clever kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting with her hand up, in on the secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, total contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Didn't expect such mischief in a calm kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's making quite the sheet down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of unexpected hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame it all perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
